attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2007-1979

Date: 2007-12-13

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que R. Cary Boswell, de la ville de Barrie dans la province d'Ontario, un avocat, soit nommé juge de la Cour supérieure de justice de l’Ontario, et juge d'office de la Cour d'appel de l'Ontario.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that R. Cary Boswell, of the City of Barrie in the Province of Ontario, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that R. Cary Boswell, of the City of Barrie in the Province of Ontario, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario.
